title: Insanity Break:  It is about the shroud or maybe, well I can’t be sure
post: Irritatingly insane… starts in the dark… then pretends to throw some light on it with false C2 (info) then wraps it up with more insanity… And, how is the Shroud related to the JFK assassination in front of the book repository?  Did someone die for this insanity?
author: clublu22014
